website_summaries.verdict: Rustic, customizable, and made of real wood.
pros: Many purchase this shelf for the unique design, and are not disappointed
Versatile in use for storing products as well as serving as a changing station
Can be painted, should you wish to change the color
cons: Reviews suggest the screw holes are not aligned properly on some models

customer_reviews.title: Great rustic shelf for your bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was a perfect fit for our small toilet room. Lightweight, yet sturdy, easy to assemble and hang. Holds just the right amount of toilet paper with a few decorations. Highly recommend, I will be buying another one for our new home.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Boone

customer_reviews.title: Looks rustic except for the open screw holes on both sides
customer_reviews.text: This is a convenient item as the shelf has a towel bar so kills two birds with one stone. The wood is real and looks weathered and rustic, but the screw hole are left open and are noticeable. It works for my bathroom but as it is on a wall that shows the sides show I'm not thrilled to see the open screw holes.I feel that really takes away from the look of the shelf a lot. Also when putting it together consumers need to be careful when screwing in the shelves that they are lined up perfectly or the screw may split the wood, it happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: sherrie hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Not assembled! But relatively easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It is not assembled. I assumed it would be since the other piece I bought to go with this one was. It wasn’t too difficult to build. I would just recommend to build from the bottom shelf up. I did it from the top shelf and ran into trying to line up the holes in the bottom shelf but I wasn’t going to dissemble it again at that point. Looks great once assembled. Took me about an hour to assemble, but I never assemble anything so I guess that was good for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beachy, western or country decor.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and exactly what I needed for my space. One of the screw holes wasn’t pre drilled but it was easy to remedy. The way it is finished it makes it look unlevel. Trick of the eye. I would have liked not as much striating. But all in all a good little shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Md67luvnlife

customer_reviews.title: Beware during assembly
customer_reviews.text: Top shelf cracked during assembly when being screwed in as indicated in the directions. The screw hole guide was too shallow so it split the wood on the shelf. Otherwise it’s good enough for the price. Looks cute in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Missing part and install doesn’t line up.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon box it was packaged in was in good shape, actual product box inside was not and obviously been opened and repackaged a few times. Missing the towel rod completely. Assembly looked easy but the figment wasn’t good at all, shelves wider than the backboard. For $60 you’d expect a much higher quality item and why I chose this one. Will be returning and looking for a different option.
customer_reviews.author: B in Utah

customer_reviews.title: ATTENTION TO DETAIL
customer_reviews.text: REALLY NICE SHELF BUT YOU HAVE TO PAY ATTENTION TO DETAIL WHEN PUTTING TOGETHER MAKE SURE THE LITTLE HOLES ON THE SHELVES ARE FACING THE BACK SO WHEN YOU GET TO THE LAST STEP YOU WONT HAVE TO TAKE APART AND FLIP THEM AROUND...LOL LEARNED THE HARD WAY ALSO MAKE SURE LINE THE HOLES UP PERFECTLY ON THE SIDES OF THE SHELF WHWNE ASSEMBLING THE SCREWS GO IN SUPER EASY AND IF THE LEAST BIT CROOKED WILL SPLIT THE SHELF
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Riley

customer_reviews.title: Very crooked shelves. Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This shelving unit was so disappointing upon assembly and install. The shelves are crooked. I could not believe the quality for the price I paid. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Coupon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rustic look, but rough material may require some extra work
customer_reviews.text: Looks as rustic as the picture, which is good. Lightweight and looks good on the bathroom wall. However, the wood is rough (including the towel bar) and will give splinters and/or pull the fabric of our towels. We will have to sand it down and apply poly to smooth it out. I was hoping we didn't have to do that part, but my SO needs a project anyway. If you're ok with the extra work, it's a nice addition!
customer_reviews.author: Tera L

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, and not worth the price regardless.
customer_reviews.text: This came broken, and is NOT worth the prices at all, even when I glued it to make it work. I didn’t feel like going through the hassle of returning it. It was packaged well, ans the box was not damaged, so it came broken from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Missing towel bar
customer_reviews.text: Just received my package and it’s missing the towel bar. Which sucks because I just purchased towels for it. I was looking forward to setting up this piece in my bathroom. Now I have to contact the seller for a towel bar or return it. Otherwise it’s a pretty good product. Although I was expecting it to be a bit more of a higher quality due to the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to install and was an easy way to add a little style into a small bathroom. One whole a the shelf wasn't drilled properly, too close to the bottom so a piece broke of wood broke off exposing the screw. Still holds up good though!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and very attractive!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this shelf! I was able to assemble it in just a few minutes using a Phillips screwdriver, the hooks on the back made it easy to hang, it's very sturdy... and it looks great!.
customer_reviews.author: LoveShopping

customer_reviews.title: ok, but issues and overpriced for product
customer_reviews.text: nice shelf, but came with no directions, thank goodness predrilled and good picture on amazon, make sure hole lined up or wood will split, hand SCREW together.
customer_reviews.author: Alicat

customer_reviews.title: It's decent
customer_reviews.text: It is overpriced, but my unit was easy to put together and fit together perfectly-I did it in about 5 minutes--it looks good, seems pretty sturdy for light things--wife and I are happy but it was overpriced for what it is. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tigo Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this little shelf. Very easy to put together, lightweight, and beautiful. Nearly a perfect match to my wood floor
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Jmerriman

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I feel that for the price it’s a great value. It was easy to build and it holds quite a bit. I’ve had it for over a month now and it seems to be holding up well. Looks great in our bathroom and even got complimented on it.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Lover

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Material
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting real, solid wood. It's just made of composite and it's super flimsy. Also, the shelves were longer than the back so I had to sand them down for it to properly for together.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B Wedgeworth

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the Picture?
customer_reviews.text: This arrived as a box of wood pieces and an assembly diagram with no picture of the assembled shelf! Seems like a picture of the assembled shelf would be in order, since it is advertised and marketed for the gift market. A bit disappointing in that area. Hopefully the couple will be able to assemble it and will be happy with the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small places
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, a little more brown then I'd like but overall happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This nice small shelf has been the highlight of ny bathroom since we got it and im in love! Super easy to put together just need a screwdriver!
customer_reviews.author: Alloara

customer_reviews.title: Shelves are a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to put together, looks great in the bathroom,.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf. Bought it for my kids' bathroom and it looks great. Easy to put together. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: SCADAMS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Useful for bathroom storage.
customer_reviews.text: Fits more stuff than I thought. Was missing the rod but the 2nd one had it. Sturdy. Good for hair products & make up items.
customer_reviews.author: kel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Very easy to assemble and it is just as pictured
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: arrived split and broken
customer_reviews.text: We never even took it out of the box entirely because the first piece we picked up was split completely in two! We returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive for what you get but still nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Lisha O

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right pieces
customer_reviews.text: I do believe I got a broken item or 3 of the same pieces that won’t assemble... any way I could get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: JO R

customer_reviews.title: Real wood
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It is real wood and looks really nice in my bathroom after it was assembled.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cute shelf, however pre drilled holes do not line up so you can’t put all the screws in and the ones that kind of line up you put a acrew in to attach the pieces and the cheap wood splits. Very disappointed overall
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Olbinski

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: Another great addition to our bathroom. Love the look as well as the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great when assembled and very light weight to build and mount
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Peterman

customer_reviews.title: Functional yet attractive!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this shelf as a diaper changing station. It's a perfect solution for me and is attractive too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Strand

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shelf unit!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works perfectly in my guest bathroom over toilet.
customer_reviews.author: MsMcD60

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really great peice that looks great and is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: ChefKelsey

customer_reviews.title: OVERPRICED!
customer_reviews.text: No assembling instructions, does not come with screws and very weak feeling wood. Would not reccomend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shelf
customer_reviews.text: Nice shelf, sturdy, smooth finish. Just what I was looking for. Actual wood, not pressed wood or paper finish.
customer_reviews.author: booksnbooks

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers measurements are off
customer_reviews.text: The predrilled holes were off by a quarter inch ..I drilled new holes so everything would line up. And the 2 bottom shelves were too long. Had to keep the sides partially unscrewed so they'd fit ... if you stand a bit away from it, it does look nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product! Pay attention to where you are putting ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product! Pay attention to where you are putting screws and the wood will be fine (regarding other reviews) it’s light weight and super simple to assemble! Kudos!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but very cheap wood and poorly made. Definitely not worth the money. Do not waste your money on this cheaply made shelf; you will be just disappointed. If I could give 0 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: ulysses wray

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap broke and purchased a second one and thay one broke the same place with trying to get top shelf to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t what I had thought it would be. It was a lot darker and the wood grain was “painted” on. I will have to paint it to make it fit into my bathroom decor.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi M. Meyerhoff

customer_reviews.title: Received My Product Broke
customer_reviews.text: The product would have been great if it wasn’t broken. It looks like someone bought it, broke it trying to assemble it, then resold it to me. Not satisfied with my experience.
customer_reviews.author: cora schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Our shelf came with a piece broken off. Cannot assemble without a chunk missing in the back that stops the side from attaching. Poor quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: SUPER CHEAP junk. Arrived in an undamaged box but was broken. Very thin material. Wouldn't recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheep
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap was not worth the money the one we got happen to be damaged as well
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Looks just like I wanted it too and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Walton

customer_reviews.title: Good for the less handy
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy this was to put together, as I am not very used to having to build anything. It looks great and is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: janine kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: The kit came with no written directions just pictures with arrows. The wood is thin and split easily. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: carla nelson

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It was very easy to assemble and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Rustic wood
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice , easy to put together. The only thing it had two areas that were chipped. Other then that, it's great !!!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Loved this shelf
customer_reviews.text: Loved this shelf. Durable, rustic look goes well in our log house. It was easy to assemble and hang. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Perry

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cheap product, top shelf broke just lifting it off the floor. Had to super glue it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rustic look
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a rustic look, this is the shelve you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This does not come with any brackets to mount on the wall-the shelves were way too long and didn’t fit. Total disaster
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf way exceeded my expectations, it looks amazing, was simple to put together and looks perfect in my bathroom!!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Love the shelves but do not like how the shelves ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the shelves but do not like how the shelves are not adjustable and that the screws show on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Cute rustic looking shelves, functional and super easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: It’s sturdy and has plenty of room for whatever you want to place on it
customer_reviews.text: I like that I didn’t need hardware to hang it on the wall
customer_reviews.author: beverly patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and love the look of it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend purchasing
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together & looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Brad B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheaply made shelf. Price should be under $20. It's very light and very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane Laugavitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my shelf. Plenty of storage yet not too big where it’s hanging in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Levi E.

customer_reviews.title: Annoying.
customer_reviews.text: The back piece came snapped in half and both boxes were undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are super pleased with the way this shelf looks and is ...
customer_reviews.text: We are super pleased with the way this shelf looks and is made. It’s way nicer than it looks in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi L Hart

customer_reviews.title: Better support needed but works well
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t mount to wall well, but putting an extra screw through the top and bottom worked well
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Size is as shown
customer_reviews.text: I am using for my new bathroom. Perfect size and look
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: michael gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy this Product
customer_reviews.text: It cracked from the middle while I assembled it. It's very flimsy for what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: 😡😡😡 the wood isn’t straight and does NOT line up!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I really like the look and feel of it as a wood ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and feel of it as a wood piece. Their were no screw holes on a few parts that a drilled myself. Additionally, you’ll have to drill it into a wall. I removed the back hooks which are better suited for paintings and not a cabinet and used drywall hangers. Otherwise, I love the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: david ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design but it smells and I am still trying to retrieve the splinters.
customer_reviews.author: Greengirl619

customer_reviews.title: real wood bathroom shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made shelf system that was easy to assemble for someone with basic tool skills. It hangs nicely on our bathroom wall with the hooks that are pre-connected on the back. Just be sure during assembly that you attach the side boards in the correct direction so the hooks are on the back and not in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Athans

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Real wood, no pressboard or cheap stuff here. Open the box and smell the pine! Predrilled holes for all the woodscrews kept the wood from splitting. Absolutely beautiful and well crafted! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jasondsmith83

customer_reviews.title: good for what I wanted it for
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to put together than I had anticipated, and I am not a very handy person. One of the shelves went in a little slanted, but minor. Might have more to do with my lack of ability with a screwdriver. But it works.In my mind it adds to the rustic charm that it is not "perfect" I like the look. Matches the mirror I got, and gives my second bathroom that rustic look I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rode

customer_reviews.title: This is alright
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say it's perfect. I think it served its purpose in my bathroom. I just moved it out because the shelves are a lot less deep than expected. My towels barely fit. If you are looking for something just to decorate or hold small things, then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go in my newly remodeled rustic bathroom. Love the way it brings it all together. Was easy to put together as it comes in pieces aside from getting the screws lined up on the shelves. I did split one side of a shelf :( But the holes are pre-drilled for you so the screws sit flush. I will be buying a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: T.Fox

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy-to-install piece
customer_reviews.text: The shelves are lightweight but therefore not necessarily the best quality wood, but great distressed look. Really happy with this addition to my bathroom, and it pairs well with the 3-piece small shelving set.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Shelf needed fabrication
customer_reviews.text: It looked like a very promising purchase however the boards weren't cut to size properly. I had to set up the table saw and cut the three shelves and dowel down as they were 3/16" too wide making the vertical boards bow out. Also, the hooks to hang on the wall are flush to the top exposing the wall anchors. Not a very well designed piece.
customer_reviews.author: A/V Guy

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: The wood smells very pleasant when you open the box. Looks great in my bathroom. The screw holes didnt perfectly align when putting together and it caused me to fray some wood but not enough to tell. I very much like this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as I expected but that's how things are made these days
customer_reviews.text: I like it but for as expensive as it is the material is cheap. The wood strips very easily and the color is more a blue grey... I'll keep it but not super impressed
customer_reviews.author: Shylinn Baty

customer_reviews.title: Wood shelves
customer_reviews.text: Is very nice and sturdy. Is bigger for bathroom wall than I wanted but is fine. Is serving its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: No hardware or instructions in package!!!
customer_reviews.text: The item came without the hardware or instructions to assemble. Returning for a replacement, hoping the 2nd one has the items needed to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Danisuzi

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, and not worth the money I paid.
customer_reviews.text: Looks used. Came with scratches. Warped towel bar. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: PossessedByShoppingDemons

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking shabby chic shelf. It was easy to assemble. It came with attached hanging hooks that are crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Hung in bathroom. Had one defective screw but was easy to replace.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! It is lightweight and perfect size in my bath. It was very easy to assemble and hang.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Eaken

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected but still like it. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Joe shults

customer_reviews.title: Nice compliment to my mancave bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shelf to install in my mancave bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Texas T

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble, looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully fit my bathroom. I filled it up and looks amazing. I had more people giving me a thumbs up to this addition than the entire bathroom remodel!
customer_reviews.author: Brian M. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: ITS OK. WHEN HUNG, IT SHOWS ALL THE SCREW HOLES FROM ASSEMBLY
customer_reviews.author: jeff giacomino

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my bathroom! They look amazing! Easy to put together and hang!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L Adams

customer_reviews.title: Rustic Looking Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just as advertised. Shelf is lightweight with real wood and looks great. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Looking 4 a Deal

customer_reviews.title: Mounting Brackets
customer_reviews.text: Needs better mounting brackets, not secured as well as i had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shelf!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together and to hang. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: You open the box and it seems like fresh wood
customer_reviews.text: Cannot brag enough about this shelf. I figured with the price it would only be ok but boy was I wrong. You open the box and it seems like fresh wood. So easy to put together and color is gorgeous. Picture doesn't do it justice. Cannot wait to hang this in my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: nicole

product_meta.title: MyGift Wall Mounted Torched Wood Bathroom Organizer Rack with 3 Shelves and Hanging Towel Bar
feature_bullets: Decorative charming rustic wood wall shelf with 3 shelves and towel bar.
Country style adds character and rustic detail to bathroom or kitchen while saving space.
Can be easily assembled and mounted to any wall with proper mounting hardware.
Approximate Dimensions (in inches): 18.25 H X 22.0 W X 7.0 D. Top Shelf - 2.75 H X 19.75 W X 6.5 D; Middle Shelf - 6.5 H; Bottom Shelf - 4.25 H; Towel Bar - 3.25 H.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars236 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
